## mapDict() function

Transform a dictionary by applying a value transformation function to each value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function mapDict<T, U>(input: Dict<T>, transform: (value: T, key: string, dict: Dict<T>) => U): Dict<U>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | Dict&lt;T&gt; | Dictionary to transform |
|  transform | (value: T, key: string, dict: Dict&lt;T&gt;) =&gt; U | Mapping function |

<b>Returns:</b>

Dict&lt;U&gt;

The transformed dictionary
